CustomField.description: Limit the file types that can be uploaded to the survey solution. Enter file extensions separated with a comma for example (jpg,doc,txt). To allow all file types, leave this field empty.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specify the file extensions that are allowed to be uploaded. Enter the file extensions separated by commas (e.g., jpg, doc, txt). If you want to allow all file types, leave this field empty.
CustomField.label: Allowed File Types
